# Sensei Group

> AI consulting and professional services arm of Hanzo AI.

## About
Sensei Group provides AI consulting, strategy, and professional services for enterprises looking to adopt and scale AI. As the services arm of Hanzo AI, Sensei Group offers end-to-end support from AI strategy development through implementation, training, and ongoing optimization. The team includes AI researchers, engineers, and industry specialists.

## Key Features
- AI strategy and roadmap development
- Custom model development and fine-tuning
- Implementation and integration services
- AI infrastructure architecture and design
- Team training and enablement programs
- Ongoing optimization and support
- Change management and AI adoption consulting
- Ethical AI and governance frameworks
- Industry-specific expertise (finance, healthcare, government, retail)
- Partnership with Hanzo AI for platform access

## Services
- Strategy Workshops: 1-2 week AI readiness assessments
- Implementation: End-to-end AI project delivery
- Training: Technical and executive AI education
- Advisory: Ongoing strategic AI counsel
- Managed AI: Fully managed AI operations
